title: Wrangler Men's Authentics Regular Fit Jean - Dark Wash
description: The Wrangler Men's Authentics Regular Fit Jean in Dark Wash offers a stylish and comfortable option for everyday wear. Crafted from a durable cotton denim with a hint of stretch, these jeans provide a classic, relaxed fit. The traditional five-pocket design and zip fly ensure practicality, while the Wrangler logo stitching and leather patch on the waistband add a touch of authenticity. These jeans are perfect for casual outings and can be paired with a variety of tops for a versatile look.
key_features: Durable cotton denim with a touch of stretch
Regular fit with a relaxed silhouette
Traditional five-pocket design with zip fly
Wrangler logo stitching and leather patch
meta_title: Wrangler Men's Authentics Regular Fit Jean - Dark Wash - Size 34
meta_description: Get Wrangler Men's Authentics Regular Fit Jean in Dark Wash for a stylish and comfortable look. Made from durable cotton denim with a touch of stretch, ideal for casual wear. Available in Size 34.
